# neo-tab



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute  | Description                         | Type      | Default     |
| ------------------ | ---------- | ----------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `active`           | `active`   | Status of the tab                   | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled`         | `disabled` | Should be activatble                | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `tab` _(required)_ | `tab`      | Label used for the tab button title | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Methods

### `setActive() => Promise<void>`

Set the active component for the tab

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
